hero_title: Train smarter. Get stronger. See the data.
site_tagline: Train smarter. Get stronger. See the data.
hero_subtitle: Mine Performance Academy combines expert coaching, measurable progress tracking, and structured programs — memberships, scheduling for events and camps, and lab and cage rentals so athletes and parents always know where they stand and what comes next.
features_sub: A training facility built around measurable results — not just reps.
feature_0_description: Adult and youth programs: hitting, pitching, strength, and combos. Choose your focus and days per week — billed every 4 weeks.
feature_1_description: View all events on the calendar, book camps and clinics by day, and see only the events you’re signed up for.
feature_2_description: Reserve hitting labs, pitching lab, turf, and cages by date and time. Perfect for solo work or team sessions.
feature_3_description: Track velocity, spin rate, exit velo, and more. Coaches use radar and tech so you see where you stand and what’s next.
programs_sub: Whether you're building velocity, refining your swing, or coming back from injury — we have a path designed for you.
program_0_desc: Adult & youth plans — hitting, pitching, strength
program_1_desc: Events, camps, clinics — view calendar and book
program_2_desc: Labs, cages, turf — reserve by date and time
about_text: Mine Performance Academy is a purpose-built baseball training facility at 4999 Houston Rd Suite 500-2, Florence, KY 41042. Batting cages, pitching lab, weight room, and assessment area. We serve athletes from 10U through high school and beyond — memberships, scheduling for camps and clinics, and lab and cage rentals available year-round.
cta_sub: View memberships, book events on the calendar, or reserve a lab or cage. We'll help you find the right fit.
coaching_sub: D1 playing experience. 500+ pitchers trained. 70+ successful rehabs. Our coaches bring real credentials and a commitment to every athlete's growth.
about_page_intro: Mine Performance Academy is a purpose-built baseball training facility in Florence, KY. We combine data-driven coaching, a fully equipped training space, and clear development plans for athletes from youth through college.
about_coaching_sub: Our coaches bring D1 playing experience, certifications, and hundreds of athletes trained. They're focused on measurable progress, smart programming, and long-term development.
about_facility_sub: Our space includes batting cages, a pitching lab, strength and conditioning area, and assessment zones designed for capturing velocity, spin rate, exit velocity, and more.
about_see_facility_sub: Take a look inside our training space.
contact_intro: Book a session, ask about programs, or schedule a facility tour. We're here to help.
contact_hours:
Monday – Friday: 8 am – 9 pm
Saturday – Sunday: 10 am – 8 pm
events_intro: All events created in Admin appear here. Use the calendar to view and book by day. Toggle to show only events you're signed up for or all events. Book based on your current membership.
member_reg_subtitle: All memberships are billed every 4 weeks. Pick your focus and days per week below — everything in one view.
member_reg_spt_definition: Strength = Sports Performance Training — Strength, movement, and conditioning — the foundation that supports pitching, hitting, and recovery.
member_reg_adult_desc: Skill development, performance training, and recovery.
member_reg_youth_remote_desc: Youth athletes and remote training programs.
member_reg_help_text: Not sure which plan fits? Contact us and we'll help you choose.
rentals_subtitle: Reserve our labs, cages, and turf space for your own training or team sessions.
rentals_choose_date_desc: Select a day on the calendar, then pick a resource and time slot below.
rentals_pick_resource_desc_with_date: Available times for {date}. We'll confirm after you submit.
story_proof_body: D1 playing experience. Hundreds of athletes trained. Real numbers — not hype.
story_place_body: Batting cages, pitching lab, weight room, and assessment area. We serve athletes from 10U through high school and beyond — lessons, memberships, camps, and open sessions year-round.
story_place_cta_sub: Book an evaluation and we'll match you with the right program and coach.
